articles.title: Brazil Says Russian Covid Vaccine Carried Live Cold Virus - NDTV
articles.description: Tainted batches of Russia's Sputnik V Covid vaccine sent to Brazil carried a live version of a common cold-causing virus, the South American country's health regulator reported in a presentation explaining its decision to ban the drug's import.
articles.content:
Russia's Gamaleya Institute, which developed the vaccine, has denied the reports. (File)
